name: Charlie Light
description:
Controls:

A, D - move
Space - jump
F - shoot, dont let your kcal drop to 0!
Click - to click :D

Please dont use P to restart, use the green flag! (cloning bug)

P - restart game

Made in 5 days with scratch - School Jam whoop whoop :D

Game Jam Macromedia 2020 Credits - Team Charlie

Game Design - Dominik, Johannes
Scripting - Dominik, Elias
Game Art - Luise, Maria
Animationen - Luise, Maria
Sound Design - Elias, Johannes
Vision Keeper - Johannes
Level Design - Dominik, Johannes
